name: Update FADE.md Transition Plan on PRD completion
description: When all stories in a PRD pass, mark it complete in FADE.md's Transition Plan section

userStories.title: Mark PRD complete in FADE.md
userStories.description: On PRD completion, update the Transition Plan checkbox
acceptanceCriteria: When all stories pass, find PRD in FADE.md Transition Plan
Change [ ] to [x] for that PRD line
If PRD not found in Transition Plan, skip silently
Do not modify any other content in FADE.md
